data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 9,984,800 citizens of the the state of Michigan.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Michigan, United States
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 9,984,800 people living in Michigan, United States. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Michigan to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, help the 2,636,606 believers in Michigan to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Arab, Saudi - Hijazi people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, encourage the church of Michigan, United States that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Michigan, United States to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Father, may the churches in Michigan, United States honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.
